label: applicableDangerousGoods
comment: Dangerous goods applicable to the transport of this supply chain consignment.

rangeIncludes.comment: Goods which may contain a substance which poses risks to people and/or the environment during transportation which is regulated by dangerous goods regulations.

domainIncludes.comment: Articles of trade or commerce which are subject to, or controlled by a rule, regulation, or law at a particular point during their logistics lifecycle.
